title: NYPD Hopes Garner Case Doesn't Trigger Ferguson-Like Violence
teaser: A grand jury in New York could reach a decision as soon as Wednesday in the case of Eric Garner. His death caused an uproar after a video showed him being placed in a choke-hold by a NYPD officer.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
